TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBuildEngine

Docs.summary: Provides a way for task authors to use a subset of the functionality of the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool BuildProjectFile (string projectFileName, string[] targetNames, System.Collections.IDictionary globalProperties, System.Collections.IDictionary targetOutputs);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool BuildProjectFile(string projectFileName, string[] targetNames, class System.Collections.IDictionary globalProperties, class System.Collections.IDictionary targetOutputs) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the project file to build.
The names of the target in the project to build. Separate multiple targets with a semicolon (;).
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of additional global properties to apply to the project. The key and value must be data types.
The outputs of each specified target.
Docs.summary: Initiates a build of a project file. If the build is successful, the outputs, if any, of the specified targets are returned.
Docs.returns: if the build was successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `targetNames`, `globalProperties`, and `targetOutputs` parameters can be `null`.
If no targets are specified, [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] builds the default targets of the project.
Target outputs are returned as <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem> arrays indexed by target name.

Docs.summary: Gets the line number of the task node within the project file that called it.
Docs.value: The line number of the task node within the project file that called it.

Docs.summary: Returns if the ContinueOnError flag was set to for this particular task in the project file.
Docs.value: if the ContinueOnError flag was set to for this particular task in the project file.

Docs.summary: Gets the line number of the task node within the project file that called it.
Docs.value: The line number of the task node within the project file that called it.

Gets the full path to the project file that contained the call to this task.
Docs.value: The full path to the project file that contained the call to this task.
